entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 10:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
